bug.author: neerajprad
bug.summary: CUDA with multichain HMC throws invalid device pointer exception
bug.description: This was fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyro-ppl/pyro/pull/1694>#1694</denchmark-link> but I am seeing this again on dev when I run . cc. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fehiepsi>@fehiepsi</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I think <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/16194>pytorch/pytorch#16194</denchmark-link> probably didn't make it into the torch-1.0.1 release. I'll just skip this from the CUDA test for the time being.
